name: Milk Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm & Sheer.Key Notes:Amber, Bergamot, White Musk.Fragrance Description:This fragrance smells like you, but better. Milk mixes seamlessly with your unique chemistry to create a sensually memorable scent‚Äîan all-encompassing softness that you won‚Äôt be able to get enough of. Milk is soft, warm, and sensual with notes of amber, bergamot, and white musk.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Borago Officinalis Seed Extract*, Sambucus Nigra Flower Extract*, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract*, Equisetum Arvense Extract*, Punica Granatum Fruit Extract*, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract* (decolorized), Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract*, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Extract*, Althaea Officinalis Root Extract*, Rosa Canina Fruit Extract*, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract*, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract*, Humulus Lupulus (Hops) Extract*, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Extract*, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Kelp) Extract*,Panax Ginseng Root Extract*, Ilex Paraguariensis Leaf Extract*, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract*, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract*, Fucus Vesiculosus Extract*, Porphyra Yezoensis Extract*, D-Alpha Tocopherol..*Certified Organic Extracts/Extraits Certifi√©s Biologiques
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

reviews.review_title: Wearers, please read & rethink amount you use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who is obsessed with fragrance, I am sorry to say, I do not like this scent.  A dear friend of mine wears this, and I have met her twice in the past week. Each time, she wore this overpowering, musty, moth-bally scent that made me feel kind of sick.   I finally asked her what she was wearing as she left today, and she told me it was a scent called dedcool extra milk, and reiterated the spelling of d-e-d.  I just looked it up and had to share that I don't think this is as pleasant for bystanders as it is for the wearer. It is like a force field of 3 feet around the wearer, and hits you in the nose and does not let up. I can still smell it in my house an hour after she left.  It kind of reminds me of the old Dolce & Gabbana red, but it continues down a path of overly cloying, soapy, musty, chemical mothball that is hard to be around.

The Xtra Milk is more concentrated, but smells totally different and ashy in comparison. I think if you liked the sample you should just get the Eau de Parfum bottle instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the $90 bottle after falling in love with a sample I got with a previous Sephora purchase. First, the sample, when sprayed, was a thick oily liquid that when rubbed on the wrist would warm up and felt slightly sticky (I associate this characteristic with oil-based perfumes) and had a very strong scent. I loved it! In contrast, the full sized bottle was very liquid-y, not thick or oily at all. It had absolutely no smell. I don't know if I got a knockoff from Sephora, if it was a bad-batch issue, or if DedCool changed the formula in the two weeks between when I got the sample and ordered the full size but I received a completely different product than I was expecting. I ended up returning it with no problems thankfully.

reviews.review_title: Scent strength can be a gamble!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: TL;DR: I do not recommend buying directly from Dedcool because each bottle I‚Äôve received smells differently (sometimes no scent at all!) and they have an unforgiving return policy.    Long Summary: I initially purchased a travel-size bottle directly from Dedcool, and I loved its clean, fresh scent. Unfortunately, it faded quickly. Seeking a stronger fragrance, I ordered a sampler set from Dedcool, hoping that the included sample of Xtra Milk would deliver. Strangely, the Xtra Milk and the og Milk had little to no scent at all. Opting to forgo the 20% discount that came with the sampler, I instead bought the original Milk layering perfume from Sephora due to their return policy. Luckily, the Sephora bottle had a stronger aroma than the travel-size one from Dedcool. Since March 8, I‚Äôve used it extensively‚Äîlayering it with other perfumes and enjoying its fresh clean scent. I purchased a second bottle through Sephora and, to my pleasant surprise, this bottle smells even stronger than the first.   I reach for it almost daily, especially loving to spray it on the crook of my elbows. Just a friendly tip: avoid spraying it on clothes, as it may leave stains.

reviews.review_title: clean skin scent - me, but better
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally pick strong scents with amber; coconut; vanilla; rose; but I received an oil sample of Milk and fell in love. it does have a slight amber note but the scent is very light & intimate.     while it doesn't have significant sillage, it more than makes up for it by smelling divinely human and comforting; it reminds me of burying your face in the neck of someone you love, and deeply inhaling their clean, musky scent.     the throw isn't strong but the longevity is great; I frequently catch whiffs of it throughout the day. this fragrance would work best when layering with another fragrance; but personally, i like it just by itself too. on my skin, it smells so sweet and clean and fresh, especially when dried down and warmed by my skin. it smells like me, but better. it's my no-perfume perfume. this will definitely be a staple fragrance for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this perfume! Being in the beauty industry for 10 years now I have tried quite a few brands of perfume. I tend to be pretty sensitive to strong scents. This perfume seems to be more of a mild fragrance and has a almost tame musky spicy scent. I noticed that this does last all day even with having spritzed it on my wrist and washing my hands constantly throughout the day it seems to of lasted. I can't wait to try other scents in this line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the DedCool Xtra Milk. I love the Milk scent, so I was excited about trying this one. This waterless formula gives you individuality and longer-wearing power. I appreciate the combination of amber, white musk, and bergamot. It is a comforting scent. On me, this fragrance was overpowering and did not work for me. I even tried layering it with other scents from the collection, but I was not able to get that wow that I desired from this fragrance. I would strongly suggest layering the fragrances to create your signature scents. It also is a great way to put a spin on the scent that you may not care for. Despite my disappointment, If you feel like you can't smell the Milk scent or want a stronger scent, then you should give the Xtra Milk a try. Overall I am very pleased with this brand, and I plan to try the candles and detergent soon. I would recommend the DedCool Xtra Milk to anyone who loves the Milk scent or lives for a stronger combination of the featured scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I first opened this package, I loved how the barcode and this beautiful bottle caught my eye! It's got a very simple yet beautiful look to it. There's something about this scent that takes me back in memory. There's a very familiar scent to it. The Dedcool Xtra Milk has a very light smell to it but it lasts a long time. I could smell it on myself the next day. I sprayed it on my wrist and I did notice that it left a slightly sticky feeling.. maybe like the way essential oils feel when you apply them to your skin. It says its a genderless fragrance but in my opinion, it has more of a feminine feel to it. The notes of bergamot and musk are beautifully blended and together creates a really pretty and timeless fragrance. This scent will never go out of style.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My name is Gabby and I'm a licensed Cosmetologist. I received the DedCool Xtra Milk. This was a different scent than what I would normally choose for myself so I'm glad I got to actually try it. It definitely has the musk scent, but I feel it adapts to everyone differently. I spray this on my family member, and it smell completely different on them than it did me. I like how this a scent you can layer with other complimentary scents. It smells more of a grown-up scent to have in your collection. This goes well with a body butter and the fragrance over top. I also like DedCool sleek packaging with barcode logo, it just looks nice sitting in my organizer. Overall, I would recommend this if you like musk scents and would give this four out five stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Easily my new favorite scent from DedCool! It‚Äôs just the perfect everyday scent is you love clean + earthy + ambery/slightly sweet scents. I‚Äôve been reaching for this one every day this week. It has a great lasting power too compared to some other clean brand formulas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Right off the bat this guy has a clean smell. But it changes the longer it‚Äôs on. I definitely prefer the dried down smell to the freshly sprayed. The texture the spray leaves is different than other fragrances I‚Äôve worn. It‚Äôs almost oily. I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs bad or anything, just a noticeable difference. i think it helps with the fragrance lasting longer. Something I have really liked about this guy is that it can layer so easily. It fun to be a fragrance chemist and create different scents. Xtra Milk is a great base. By itself it gives me more summer vibes, but you can change it up when you start mixing it. I love that it‚Äôs vegan and cruelty free. There is just a whole new formulation to this that I think makes it so unique. I haven‚Äôt mixed this guy with any other brands, but Dedcool has other awesome fragrances that just compliment each other so well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was on the lookout for a fresh signature scent, so when I stumbled upon DedCool Xtra Milk, I was beyond excited to give it a try. This brand has been gaining a lot of attention lately, and the musky scent of Xtra Milk seemed like the perfect addition to my fragrance collection. I anticipated that it would work well as both a standalone scent and for layering with similar fragrances like vanillas and woods.  Upon trying it out, I immediately noticed the prominent notes of Amber and White Musk, which added depth and complexity to the scent. It's truly a unique fragrance that stands out from the crowd. I found it to be versatile enough for everyday wear, whether I'm running errands or heading out for a special occasion.  Overall, DedCool Xtra Milk has exceeded my expectations and has quickly become a staple in my fragrance lineup. Its ability to blend seamlessly with other scents makes it a must-have for anyone looking to elevate their scent game.

reviews.review_text: Mhm, so DedCool  Xtra Milk perfume is not scent  I would recommend. So I love the packaging, however once I opened it, I wasn‚Äôt impressed. I‚Äôm pretty sure some people who are a minimalistic, would love it, but I wasn‚Äôt too fond of it. The the perfume smell is just OK. I wouldn‚Äôt say that it‚Äôs a smell that someone would say wow what are you wearing? it‚Äôs more of perfume that you would put on to go on a run to target or CVS and want to smell decent. I did have to sprayed a few times to get the product out, which was a bit annoying but not the end of the world. I sprayed it on my wrist but I do believe that if I would‚Äôve sprayed it on my clothes, it would have probably stained.  The perfume leaves a shiny sort of residue cast on the skin and I just don‚Äôt like the feeling that it left.  And the longer I left it on, I felt like my skin was burning. Nonetheless,  It is very subtle, but it‚Äôs not bad, but it would not be my first choice to grab if I was going out somewhere and I wanted my smell to linger.  Also, I did leave the perfume on for awhile and it started to smell like iron liquid.

reviews.review_text: As beauty influencer, brand ambassador, beauty content creator, makeup and beauty product seller, and as a person who has knowledge and experience in cosmetics, beauty products, makeup, and fitness; I love Ded Cool Xtra Milk. The scent of this perfume is very clean, simple, refreshing, and unique. It‚Äôs also genderless. All genders can wear it. Ded Cool Xtra Milk definitely stands out from other perfumes. I love the unique and beautiful scent of this perfume. I apply this perfume behind my ears and on my wrist. This perfume lasts all day long, and it doesn‚Äôt go away quickly. This odor also boosts my mood, and it boosts my self confidence. When I use this perfume, I feel alluring attractiveness. I love the cute and the pure bottle of Ded Cool Xtra Milk. I also love the box of this perfume. The bottle is very clean and easy to use. I also love the size of the perfume because it‚Äôs not too big and not too small. I love the fact that the bottle is made from pure, thin glass like most perfume bottles. However, if the bottle falls, it will instantly break. Overall, amazing perfume.

reviews.review_text: Talk about a bait and switch!! I bought this after receiving a sample with a prior Sephora order. It smelled AMAZING. I loved it. My husband loved it. Immediately went on this app to order, but it was out of stock (which of course made me want it more ü§£). Turned on an alert and a week later received a notification that it was back in stock.I immediately added it to my cart and ordered it in 2 mins flat! While it took over a week to arrive, I started reading the reviews out of curiosity. Multiple people mentioned it smells like nothing and is basically just water. I thought their noses must be faulty because the sample smelled absolutely HEAVENLY.  I awaited delivery eagerly and when it arrived, imagine my shock when I sprayed it and it literally smelled like‚Ä¶ nothing.
